scripts.test: npm run compile && TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 hardhat test ./test-suites/test-oasyslend/*.spec.ts
scripts.test-scenarios: npm run compile && TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 hardhat test test-suites/test-oasyslend/__setup.spec.ts test-suites/test-oasyslend/scenario.spec.ts
scripts.test:main:check-list: npm run compile && FORK=main TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 hardhat test  test-suites/test-oasyslend/__setup.spec.ts test-suites/test-oasyslend/oasys/check-list.spec.ts
scripts.oasyslend:testnet:dev:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:testnet -- oasyslend:dev
scripts.oasyslend:oasys:dev:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:oasys -- oasyslend:dev
scripts.oasyslend:docker:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- oasyslend:oasys --skip-registry
scripts.oasyslend:docker:full:migration:add-regi: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- oasyslend:oasys
scripts.oasyslend:docker:add-market-to-registry-: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- add-market-to-registry --pool Oasyslend
scripts.oasyslend:testnet:add-market-to-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:testnet -- add-market-to-registry --pool Oasyslend
scripts.oasyslend:oasys:add-market-to-registry-f: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:oasys -- add-market-to-registry --pool Oasyslend
scripts.oasyslend:docker:add-market-to-new-regis: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- add-market-to-registry --pool Oasyslend --deploy-registry
scripts.oasyslend:testnet:add-market-to-new-regi: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:testnet -- add-market-to-registry --pool Oasyslend --verify --deploy-registry
scripts.oasyslend:oasys:add-market-to-new-regist: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:oasys -- add-market-to-registry --pool Oasyslend --verify --deploy-registry
scripts.oasyslend:fork:main: npm run compile && FORK=main hardhat oasyslend:oasys
scripts.oasyslend:testnet:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:testnet -- oasyslend:oasys
scripts.oasyslend:oasys:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:oasys -- oasyslend:oasys
scripts.oasyslend:main:full:initialize: npm run compile && FORK=main full:initialize-tokens --pool Oasyslend
scripts.ci:test: npm run compile && npm run test
scripts.external:deploy-assets-testnet: npm run compile && hardhat --network testnet external:deploy-new-asset --symbol ${SYMBOL} --verify
scripts.external:deploy-assets-oasys: npm run compile && hardhat --network oasys external:deploy-new-asset --symbol ${SYMBOL} --verify
